notifications.email-ns: This browser doesn't support it yet.

hero.title: Frontend Developer, web enthusiast.
hero.desc: Iâ€™m Patryk, a Frontend Developer based in Warsaw, Poland, specialising in creating PWA apps, client-side code optimisations, projects support & improvements, and so on. I enjoy creating things that help others to achieve their goals. Feel free to look on my portfolio and reach out if you are interested in connecting.
hero.subtitle: Follow me

dbbetb-e46b8r8b54e3f.title: IGPlus Browser Extension
dbbetb-e46b8r8b54e3f.desc: An Instagram extension that allows users to disable Reels, Stories, recommendations, vanity metrics, and customize themes, fonts, and more. Currently, it has ~500 active users across all platforms. Available for Google Chrome, Firefox, and MS Edge.

db64-be4dbf8r8b54e3f.title: GPT 3.5 / 4 Automatization Tool
db64-be4dbf8r8b54e3f.desc: A CLI tool with multiple pipelines for automated posts generation using OpenAI GPT 3.5 / 4. Has such features, as combining post chunks, post validations, QuillBot Paraphraser for all / random strings (to avoid plagiarism and AI detection), Unsplash API relative image search (+multiaccount for API), and more.

db64-betnrwnrt45v4gn.title: Lichess Browser Extension
db64-betnrwnrt45v4gn.desc: Extension for Lichess. Adds new themes, pieces, boards, fonts, and features such as annoying popups disable, modern layout, coordinates on each square, and many more. Available for Google Chrome, Firefox, and MS Edge.

db64-be46bmyr8b54egf.title: ChessHelper for Chess.com
db64-be46bmyr8b54egf.desc: Simmilar project to LichessHelper. Contains almost the same features but for Chess.com. Currently, it has ~350 active users on all platforms. Most of the pieces and boards were also created by me, but some of them are from the web with GNU / CC0 License. Available for Google Chrome, Firefox, Opera and MS Edge.

db64-be46b8rht53f.title: Parallax Gallery
db64-be46b8rht53f.desc: Gallery project with a smooth parallax effect. Lightweight and efficient, comprising only ~100 lines of code.

db64-rt46b8r8b543f.title: SpoPlus Extension for Spotify
db64-rt46b8r8b543f.desc: Extension that enables customization and personalization of the web version of Spotify. Set up new themes, fonts, remove annoying notifications, popups, and more. ~600 active users on all platforms. Available for Google Chrome, Firefox, and MS Edge.

db64-betnrgn-ntrt44v4gn.title: Chess in Browser | TypeScript
db64-betnrgn-ntrt44v4gn.desc: Chess game in the browser. Developed using OOP, TypeScript, with mobile support. Currently implemented features include pieces capture, main pieces move rules, and en passant. In progress are short and long castle, checks, checkmate, kings' single square gap, and more.

db64-be46b8r8b54e3f.title: TrainingPeaks - Sport Monitoring
db64-be46b8r8b54e3f.desc: Monitoring for personal training with three main resources: plans, daily feelings, and workouts. Each section is customizable, allowing users to easily drag and drop training sessions from one day to another. Additionally, it provides weekly statistics.

dbf0-beqr56b8r8brbe5l.title: OnlineStats.info - Monitoring Service
dbf0-beqr56b8r8brbe5l.desc: Startup service for monitoring your own or your kids' online status in Telegram Messenger. Utilizes JWT Auth, bizcharts charts, final-form for forms. Also it has i18n locales and a dark theme.

dbf0-beqr0b890eq9r8b98.title: Music App Project
dbf0-beqr0b890eq9r8b98.desc: ReactJS & Redux Music player. Contains usable mobile version, localStorage cache. Works with AudioSession Api, so browser features (like hotkey buttons Next/Prev, album preview) is working right.

fbd07wavab0987erab709adb.title: Todo List SPA
fbd07wavab0987erab709adb.desc: Anydo-like to-do list application with full functionality, including all CRUD operations (add, update, read, or delete any task), sorting by tags, and JWT Auth. It also includes a mobile version with Safari viewport and other enhancements.

fadb0978a8f90b7986da0968.title: Twitter Clone
fadb0978a8f90b7986da0968.desc: Utilizes final-form validation for form handling, allows posting tweets, has routings for both guests and logged-in users, and tweets fetching.

0879fbd9078adfb0a7dfb908.title: Nolk Template
0879fbd9078adfb0a7dfb908.desc: Responsive template with a ton of SVG animations and a simple 3-step email form. Built with vanilla JavaScript, the task runner used for file minification is Gulp.
